lead_paragraph: ESTES-MILANO--Kathleen Wife, mother, teacher and all around amazing person, Kathleen passed away peacefully on January 14th in her home, surrounded by her husband John, daughters Mattie and Hallie, and Ben the Cat. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ESTES, MILANO, KATHLEEN WIFE
